name: Handcraft: Snowflakes
description: Christmas mood is very easy to create with the help of wonderful snowflakes! Cutting snowflakes is fun and exciting. With our application, you can cut snowflakes even without sharp scissors and paper. Choose material of any color and texture and make snowflakes easily and conveniently on the screen of a smartphone or tablet. Save the best work in the album and surprise your friends with magnificent patterns of wonderful Christmas snowflakes.
